name: calculate_distance
description: Calculates the distance between two geographic coordinates using the Haversine formula. Returns the distance in kilometers or miles based on the specified unit parameter.

lat1.description: Latitude of the first location in decimal degrees

lon1.description: Longitude of the first location in decimal degrees

lat2.description: Latitude of the second location in decimal degrees

lon2.description: Longitude of the second location in decimal degrees

unit.description: Unit of measurement for the distance

returns.description: The calculated distance between the two coordinates
